backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing access‑controlled user profiles plus post and chunk structures with placeholder chunked‑upload logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting an update to use a 64×64 PNG favicon in frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend component, hook, utility, and configuration file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global CSS defining OKLCH color tokens and dark‑mode overrides for the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading main.tsx and referencing the generated 64×64 PNG favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing auth state, profile setup, post viewing, uploads, and main navigation flow.
frontend/src/components/feed/Feed.tsx: Renders a paginated grid of PostCards with loading, error, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Displays a post preview, detecting image/video media and generating a blob URL for rendering.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, greeting text, and login/logout plus upload controls tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero video and three marketing cards styled with orange shadows.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/upload/UploadBut: Simple button component that triggers an upload action.
frontend/src/components/upload/UploadCom: Provides a file picker and chunked upload UI with progress, cancel, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/viewer/PostViewe: Shows a full post with media display, share link creation, and deletion for the author.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedUpload.ts: Handles chunked media uploads with progress tracking, retry logic, cancellation, and feed invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and mutate user profiles and posts via the actor, including paginated post retrieval and deletion.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, and custom styles for branding and shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/chunking.ts: Implements file chunking utilities for slicing files, counting chunks, and calculating byte ranges.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallbacks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, existing features, and notes including chunked uploads and favicon needs.
